fullText:
MCP生态
Jupyter MCP Server，让AI助手直接在你的Jupyter笔记本中添加代码/文字

比如用Python分析一个数据集，“计算一下这个数据集的平均值和标准差”，你可以用自然语言给Claude

Claude不仅可以生成结果，还可以直接把计算平均值和标准差的Python代码添加到Jupyter https://t.co/hT38eOvCEf

Most things just need to work. That’s enough to win. But some things have soul. Beauty that wasn’t required. Care that wasn’t necessary. A surplus of love.

That’s Y Combinator. Paul & Jessica didn’t have to make it feel like home. But they did—and it changed lives.

Happy 20th!

langchain的MCP：mcpdoc，通过解析llms.txt文件提取相关信息，解决信息过载/不完整/不准确的问题，帮AI助手理解复杂的框架文档
